item.title: YUI Compressor CSS Barfs on Unclosed Apostrophe
item.description: I was running my deployment script last night, which includes the YUI compressor, and it went KABOOM! Not good. I knew from the massive stack trace that it failed during YUI CSS processing. The stacktrace was a mile long, too long to be contained in the 5000 line terminal buffer, so I did a quick binary search removing files from the include list, and then lines from the culprit CSS file.
